## Netflix Example

### `separate()` movie categories

Let's first try four categories...

```{r}
netflix_4cat <- netflix %>%
  separate(
    col = listed_in,
    into = c("cat1", "cat2", "cat3", "cat4"),
    sep = ",",
    remove = FALSE
  )

netflix_4cat %>% 
  select(cat1:cat4) %>% 
  skim()
```
